Text: This is the best quality out so far, the English subs are hard... I downloaded this on this morning from Demonoid...
Thanks SAFCuk! Finally a version with hardcoded subs only for the non-english speaking parts.
Anyone else having problems downloading? Im not getting any seeders

This is a 2.5 hour movie, so the video quality at 1GiB is comparable to those 700MiB rips of shorter movies. It lacks sharpness but it's perfectly clear. Gets a +1 from me. A7, V8.

Thanks, SAFCukO09.
